snippet: A landslide buried dozens of people and killed at least 25 on Thursday, at a small gold mining site in the southern Philippines, where government officials had warned miners months ago that the mountain was guaranteed to crumble.
abstract: Landslide buries dozens of people and kills at least 25 at a small gold mining site in the southern Philippines; government officials had warned miners months ago that the mountain was guaranteed to crumble.
lead_paragraph: A landslide buried dozens of people and killed at least 25 on Thursday, at a small gold mining site in the southern Philippines, where government officials had warned miners months ago that the mountain was guaranteed to crumble.
